price: ដែលវាធ្វើដំណើរតាមការឃ្លាំមើលរបស់យើងគឺជាការ តបស្នងចំពោះអ្នកដែលត្រូវបានគេប្រឆាំង(នួហ)។
arabic: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: tajrī bi-aʿyuninā jazāan liman kāna kufira
